shared by Mr. Le Hoai Nam, deputy director of the Department of Education and Training of Ho Chi Minh City,
at a conference summarizing the
city's early-level accreditation and admission work yesterday
afternoon.  According to statistics in
this year's entrance exam, nearly 5,000 students admitted to
public 10th grade did not enroll. The
reason is that many candidates live in the
center but cannot enroll in suburban schools.
studying because they were far from home, although the
city later recruited additional students, there were still
nearly 2,000 empty seats in
next year's 10th grade entrance exam. The subjects and
exam methods will remain the same as
previous years. However, the Department of Education and Training  The Department
will coordinate and review the entire
guidance and counseling process of some
secondary schools, adding evaluation criteria
to ensure the achievement of
goals, including shortening the time to announce
results of academic support.  Students increase their chances of being
admitted to public schools according to their
registration wishes. Gradually reduce
the number of students who are admitted but
do not apply each year. In addition,
the department will review the admission quotas in
schools.  The unit ensures that 70 students graduating from

high schools
in accordance with the ministry's recent streamlining regulations

rare sea turtle, the pineapple-scented hill,
weighing 40 kg. This is one of seven

world in the category  Endangered,
rare, in danger of extinction and in need of
protection, according to fishermen, in the past few days,

based on tax assessment results, the amount of

previously. At the trial held on

However, due to the

Chi Minh City police said that recently, many
people impersonating employees of
registration centers have called car owners to

At registration shops,

because the scammers know the

local license plate.  It's just the time when the vehicle's license expires,
so the people don't have any

will send a confirmation slip via the
express delivery system and then the

Back to the program with
international information, ladies and gentlemen in the city.
Ningbo, Zhejiang province, China,
archaeologists have discovered many
4,000-year-old relics from the Neolithic period to the
dynastic period. The excavation took place from
February to August this year and has revealed many interesting
secrets.
Most of the excavated relics date
back to prehistoric times, including
wooden burial mounds and
ash tombs from the fourth phase of the
Ha Khac Do culture as well as relics of the houses of ethnic minorities.
Pottery fragments and stone table tools from the
Liangli culture according to the
Ningbo City Cultural Heritage Management Research Institute, the
archaeological materials excavated at the
site have important value in
reconstructing the context.
Regional cultural development as well as research on
changes in human settlement at
Chen One site not only
enriches the distribution of
prehistoric sites in the Ningbo Plain but
also extends  a period of time from
the Neolithic period to the Tang
and
Song dynasties The British
Royal mint and the London Museum of Natural History have
just announced a series of
50x coins with terrible images. This is  This is the first time
this prehistoric creature has appeared
in the British currency system. The
coin is divided into three
collections with three different dinosaurs
including Tyrannosaurus,
Stegosaurus and
Dinosaur.  Diplodocus, the biggest dinosaur on the planet, was
all designed by
British paleoartist Robert Nichol.
I started the design process by
recreating the animal inside and out to
get its exact body proportions.  The
only challenge of
this project is that I have to find a way to place
these giant dinosaurs on the 50
x dinosaur coin correctly. The 50 x dinosaur coin
from the collection called
tales of the earth will be  sold on the
official website of the
British Royal Mint, in which the Gold
proof coin will cost up to 1,220
pounds, equivalent to 1,550
US dollars. Christmas markets in Hungary are
places that attract many tourists.
year-end calendar in Europe, but this year
many people are overwhelmed when prices at
Christmas markets have increased
sharply. Basilica Christmas market in the capital
Budapest this year still attracts
visitors, but prices have increased sharply.  A bowl of
traditional Hungarian beef stew costs $12,
stuffed cabbage costs $18, and
a hot doot costs up to $23. In a
beautiful market like this, everyone
wants to visit, but  The price of
food at this market is too high compared to the
income of many people. The price is too high.
When I was a child, I could buy a whole cart of
chestnuts for only 1/4 the price of buying a
bag of chestnuts today.  Advent
Basilica Market is one of the places that
websites suggest tourists should visit when
traveling to Europe at the end of the year. Even though the prices
here are extremely high,
tourists still flock to
this place.  Thanks to Hungary's technological equipment,
seniors at a nursing home in the east of

Christmas atmosphere across Europe
without having to go
anywhere.  Many old men
and women in old margareta positions were
not able to travel around Europe to
explore Christmas markets and many
other places during the year-end holidays,
but now many people seem
excited after traveling.  around
markets in many countries through virtual reality devices.
This virtual reality travel theme revolves
around Christmas markets while the
previous version was about visiting
European cities. I can't find the
words.  To describe this experience, I am 90

I even flew around the
towers in
Vasava. This is one of the initiatives
to help  People in Viet Nam

People eagerly flock to the streets to board
